item.dc:creator: eme
item.description: Saw how Saf Label pro LLC, a business that distributes the goods made by the three Colombian businesses in the American market, is incorporated in Florida.

item.dc:creator: eme
item.description: Bolpack Colombia’s entry onto the market in 2019. The board of shareholders resolves to form a third firm to produce eco-friendly packaging in response to shifting consumer behavior and rising environmental awareness (paper bags and food containers in Kraft paper).

item.dc:creator: eme
item.description: Saw the founding of Globalflex Colombia SAS, this shareholder’s board’s second business, with the goal of making and selling labels and shrink sleeves with high levels of customization.

item.dc:creator: eme
item.description: In the city of Barranquilla, a production facility was built in 2010. Calidad Grafica, Globalflex, and Bolpack presently produce and store their products in a 45.208 sq feet warehouse. In the production area there are state-of-the art machines in offset, flexographic and other technologies.

item.dc:creator: eme
item.description: Rafael Salcedo Villareal founded the Editorial Mejoras in 1936 with the goal of editing and producing magazines and books.
